title: The Grade 4 Leap: Fractions and Large Numbers
excerpt: Grade 4 is considered the filtering grade. What's expected of students and how to prepare?
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
The Transition Stage

In Grade 4, students move from simple calculations to a more abstract understanding of fractions and decimal numbers.

This is the time to strengthen mastery of the multiplication table in preparation for long division and fractions.
